summary: A comprehensive test suite for the Prefect Elastic Container Service (ECS) infrastructure provisioner, covering resource-specific classes such as authentication, cluster, container repository, credentials block, execution role, IAM policies and users, and VPC management, as well as the overall push provisioner workflow, using mocked AWS services to validate planning, task counting, provisioning actions, idempotency, and error handling.
business_intent: Validate that the ECS provisioner reliably creates and configures required AWS resources for Prefect work pools, ensuring correct behavior across various scenarios, proper handling of existing resources, user interactions, and naming conventions, thereby supporting automated and repeatable infrastructure deployment.
